tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE employee_demographics (
  employee_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  race_ethnicity VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  department VARCHAR(50),
  position VARCHAR(50),
  hire_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE employee_demographics (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    ethnicity VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE employees (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    race_ethnicity VARCHAR(50),
    job_title VARCHAR(255),
    department VARCHAR(255));

CREATE TABLE employee_salaries (employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    salary DECIMAL,
    bonus DECIMAL,
    benefits DECIMAL);

CREATE TABLE employee_personal_info (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    gender VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE employee_employment_info (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    hire_date DATE,
    department VARCHAR(50),
    position VARCHAR(50),
    salary DECIMAL(10, 2),
    manager_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE employee_diversity_info (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    race VARCHAR(50),
    ethnicity VARCHAR(50),
    disability_status VARCHAR(20),
    veteran_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE EmployeeDemographics (
  employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  race VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE EmployeeJobDetails (
  job_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  job_title VARCHAR(100),
  department VARCHAR(100),
  hire_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE EmployeeSalaries (
  salary_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  salary DECIMAL(10, 2),
  bonus DECIMAL(10, 2),
  benefits DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE EmployeePerformance (
  performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  review_date DATE,
  performance_rating INT,
  comments TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE EmployeeEEOCData (
  eeo_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  hire_year INT,
  promotion_count INT,
  training_hours DECIMAL(6, 2)
)
